description: Request to check out an item to a loanee using barcodes

itemBarcode.description: Barcode of the item to be lent to the patron

userBarcode.description: Barcode of the user (representing the patron) the item is to be lent to

proxyUserBarcode.description: Barcode of the user representing a proxy for the patron

loanDate.description: When the loan is to begin, defaults to current date and time

servicePointId.description: Service point where the item has been checked out
